### [style.css](file:///home/shawn/.config/waybar/style.css)

To make the Waybar vertically shorter:
1. Reduce the font size slightly.
2. Decrease vertical paddings and margins for all main modules and buttons.
3. Ensure border-radius and min-height do not add extra height.

Below are the concise changes:

2. Decrease vertical paddings and margins for all main modules and buttons.
3. Ensure border-radius and min-height do not add extra height.
